verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana nitakushukuru
kwa moyo wangu wote. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Asubuhi nitakuimbia
kwa shangwe na vigelegele.
Nitacheza ngoma na kayamba,
kinanda pia baragumu.
Mchana nitarukaruka,
usiku nitakusifu
mimi nitasimulia,
matendo yako makuu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana nitakuabudu
kwa moyo wangu wote. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana nitakutukuza
kwa moyo wangu wote. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana kwa upendo
wako mimi nimeumbwa. x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana nitayatangaza
matendo yako mema. x2
